name: Dodger (Otter_and_Bench)
description:
Description:

A simple dodger game with tons of costumes for the character, smooth movement, and a complex generation system offering  hard and intense play! Put your mouse maneuvering skills to the test and pimp out your character along the way. During our creation of this project, we learned how to create shop systems

// sorry y'all otter has no mf chill^^

Stuff you probably don't care about:

We made this game in 3 days, so hopefully it isn't too buggy! We decided to challenge ourselves to make a game as fast as we could. Even though the game is simple, we worked hard on certain mechanics such as the shop and saving/loading a game. We had already done some of the saving/loading on Anticore, but only the high scores for each game mode. Please be kind, we are still very new to Gamemaker Studio, but constructive criticism is always welcome! :)
